blocks.content:
## About us 

Although we know the design we made on her hands were not as good as an artist creates... But the love we shared make her mehndi.. So beautiful.. So Meaningful.. So rememberable... That an artist will fail to do so.

## Services 

1. Bridal Mehndi
2. Engagement Mehndi
3. House warming Mehndi
4. Festival Mehndi
5. And for all other occasions

hero.headline: Welcome to Vino Mehndi.
hero.textline: Be in her Mehndi... Not in Scars...
